page.title: 19THE COUNTRYSIDE.
page.content: I like living in the country, it is very peaceful and there are lots of trees and fields. The tractors are noisy but otherwise it is very quiet. Most of the time I like to ride my bicycle because there is lots of room and very few cars. Lots of my friends go cycling too and there are some very nice cycle rides around Rotherwick. I live in a bungalow in Rotherwick in a quiet lane of the main street. The main street is the only road through the village and it is a very quiet on except at the start and end of school. There are some streams near the village and you can often see moorhens, swans, ducks and sometimes water rats.
